declarations.description:
A card component with support for title, content, and footer sections.
Card Element Title

This is the main content of the card element.

It uses web components with shadow DOM.

Card element footer
Outline Variant

This card element has a outline variant.

Footer info
Card Element with Title Only

This card element has a title but no footer.

Card Element with Content Only

No title or footer, just content.

 **Card Elements in a `.collection`**
Card Element 1

This is the main content.

Using web components.

More text

Footer info
Card Element 2

This is the main content.

Using web components.

Footer info
Card Element 3

Shorter content.

Footer info
Card Element 4

Another card.

Footer info

declarations.description: A button component that copies text to the clipboard with visual feedback.
declarations.name: MCopyButton

cssProperties.description: Gap between content and icon (default: var(--size-1))
cssProperties.name: --copy-button-gap

cssProperties.description: Opacity of icon in normal state (default: 0.5)
cssProperties.name: --copy-button-icon-opacity

slots.description: Optional slot for custom icon (overrides default copy icon)
slots.name: icon

members.name: value
members.description: The text to copy to clipboard (required)

members.name: showIcon
members.description: Show/hide the copy icon (default: true)

members.name: feedback
members.description: Custom feedback message shown on successful copy (default: "Copied!")

events.name: copy-success
events.description: Fired when text is successfully copied (detail: { value: string })

events.name: copy-error
events.description: Fired when copy fails (detail: { error: Error })

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The text to copy to clipboard (required)

attributes.name: feedback
attributes.description: Custom feedback message shown on successful copy (default: "Copied!")

fits

attributes.name: font-display

declarations.description:
A search list component that filters items based on user input using fuzzy search. Filters items by matching against their text content and data-keywords attribute. Features debounced input handling and accessible screen reader announcements for search results. ### Example
JavaScript
TypeScript
Python

No match found

Search programming languages

 ### With target selector
  • Item 1
  • Item 2
 ### With custom debounce
Item 1
Item 2
declarations.name: MSearchList

slots.description: Slot for the input element that controls the search
slots.name: controller

slots.description: Slot for the list container and items to be filtered
slots.name: (default)

slots.description: Optional content to display when no items match the search query
slots.name: empty

slots.description: Optional content to display before any search query is entered
slots.name: initial

members.name: target
members.description: CSS selector for the container element

members.name: debounce
members.description: Time in milliseconds to debounce input events

members.name: input
members.description: The input element used for search

members.name: items
members.description: Array of filterable items

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: CSS selector for the container element whose children should be filtered
Time in milliseconds to debounce input events (default: 150ms)
attributes.name: debounce

cssStates.description: Applied when no search query has been entered
cssStates.name: initial

cssStates.description: Applied when a search query is entered and matches are found
cssStates.name: match

cssStates.description: Applied when a search query is entered and no matches are found
cssStates.name: empty

declarations.description:
A tab list container that manages tabs and their associated panels with full keyboard navigation.
Supports horizontal (arrow left/right, h/l) and vertical (arrow up/down, j/k) navigation depending on position.
Home/End keys work in both orientations.

### Examples
<m-tab-list label="Example" tab="tab2">
    <m-tab panel="tab1">Tab 1</m-tab>
    <m-tab panel="tab2">Tab 2</m-tab>
    <m-tab panel="tab3" disabled>Tab 3</m-tab>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab1"> Panel value 1</m-tab-panel>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab2"> Panel value 2</m-tab-panel>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab3"> Panel value 3</m-tab-panel>
</m-tab-list>

<m-tab-list label="Example" tab="tab2" position="bottom">
    <m-tab panel="tab1">Tab 1</m-tab>
    <m-tab panel="tab2">Tab 2</m-tab>
    <m-tab panel="tab3" disabled>Tab 3</m-tab>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab1"> Panel value 1</m-tab-panel>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab2"> Panel value 2</m-tab-panel>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab3"> Panel value 3</m-tab-panel>
</m-tab-list>

<m-tab-list label="Example" tab="tab2" position="start">
    <m-tab panel="tab1">Tab 1</m-tab>
    <m-tab panel="tab2">Tab 2</m-tab>
    <m-tab panel="tab3" disabled>Tab 3</m-tab>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab1"> Panel value 1</m-tab-panel>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab2"> Panel value 2</m-tab-panel>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab3"> Panel value 3</m-tab-panel>
</m-tab-list>

<m-tab-list label="Example" tab="tab2" position="end">
    <m-tab panel="tab1">Tab 1</m-tab>
    <m-tab panel="tab2">Tab 2</m-tab>
    <m-tab panel="tab3" disabled>Tab 3</m-tab>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab1"> Panel value 1</m-tab-panel>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab2"> Panel value 2</m-tab-panel>
    <m-tab-panel name="tab3"> Panel value 3</m-tab-panel>
</m-tab-list>
declarations.name: MTabList

members.name: label
members.description: Accessible label for the tab list

members.name: tab
members.description: The currently active tab panel name

members.name: position
members.description: Tab list orientation

events.description: Fired when a tab panel becomes visible. Detail: MTabChangeEventDetail { tab: MTab, panel: MTabPanel }
events.name: m-tab-show

events.description: Fired when a tab panel becomes hidden. Detail: MTabChangeEventDetail { tab: MTab, panel: MTabPanel }
events.name: m-tab-hide

attributes.name: tab
attributes.description: The currently active tab panel name

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Accessible label for the tab list (sets aria-label)

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Tab list orientation: top/bottom for horizontal, start/end for vertical

declarations.description: A tab panel that displays content when its associated tab is active.
declarations.name: MTabPanel

members.name: name
members.description: Unique identifier for this panel, referenced by m-tab's panel attribute

members.name: visible
members.description: Whether this panel is currently visible

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: Whether this panel is currently visible

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this panel, referenced by m-tab's panel attribute

declarations.description: A tab button used within m-tab-list for switching between tab panels.
declarations.name: MTab

slots.description: Default slot for tab label content

members.name: panel
members.description: ID of the associated tab panel to control

members.name: active
members.description: Whether this tab is currently active

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether this tab is disabled and cannot be selected

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Whether this tab is currently active

attributes.name: panel
attributes.description: ID of the associated tab panel to control

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether this tab is disabled and cannot be selected

declarations.name: fuzzySearch

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query to look for

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Minimum similarity threshold (0-1), where 1 requires exact match

declarations.description:
Fuzzy string matching that handles typos, transpositions, and works with any language/script. The higher the
threshold (0-1), the pickier it is about matches. 0.7 is a good default that catches most typos while avoiding false
positives.
